title: 95-year-old woman tied up during 'vile' attempted robbery by man who offered to clean windows
desc: Greater Manchester Police have appealed for any CCTV, dashcam or doorbell footage from the area at the time.

title: Jetour Nigeria partners with seven major automobile dealers
desc: Jetour Nigeria expands its national presence by partnering with seven top auto dealers, aiming to reshape the country's competitive automotive market.

title: Judge Temporarily Blocks Deportation of 5-Year-Old Detained by ICE in Minnesota
desc: An image of the boy, wearing a Spider-Man backpack as he was detained by federal agents, became a symbol of the immigration crackdown in Minnesota.

title: Heated Rivalry Cast Connor Storrie, François Arnaud
desc: Connor Storrie and François Arnaud attend Saint Laurent Paris show during Fashion Week. See the “Heated Rivalry” stars in the front row.

title: Rubbish mountain cleared at KL transfer station
desc: THE mounting waste problem at Kuala Lumpur's main transfer station has been brought under control, says Datuk Fadlun Mak Ujud.

title: China’s Xigou Site Yields Evidence of Advanced Stone Tool Technology
desc: Archaeologists have uncovered evidence of technological innovations at the site of Xigou in China’s Henan province, dating to between 160,000 and 72,000 years ago.

title: Brooks Koepka reveals Tiger Woods' role in PGA Tour return
desc: Brooks Koepka was freed from the final year of his contract with Saudi-funded LIV Golf and the first person he called was Tiger Woods. Three weeks later, the PGA Tour created a path back for him that starts at Torrey Pines.

title: Egypt eliminates Nigeria from Africa Handball Championship
desc: Egypt crushed Nigeria 48-22 in the Africa Handball Championship, eliminating them from semi-final contention and hopes of direct World Championship qualifi

title: UK-based Nigerian jailed six years for sexual assault
desc: A UK-based Nigerian, Daniel Odubanjo, has been jailed for six years for false imprisonment and sexually assaulting a woman on a train. Read the full detail

title: Southwest Begins Assigned Seating, Scrapping a Signature Quirk
desc: The airline said its new policy, rolled out on Tuesday, responded to passengers’ preferences, but some customers said the scramble was part of the charm.
